org.osmdroid.tileprovider.cachemanager

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.cachemanager.CacheManager

  • public class CacheManager
extends Object
    Provides various methods for managing the local filesystem cache of osmdroid tiles:
    - Dowloading of tiles inside a specified area,
    - Cleaning of tiles inside a specified area,
    - Information about cache capacity and current cache usage.

    Important note 1:
    These methods only make sense for a MapView using an OnlineTileSourceBase: bitmap tiles downloaded from urls.

    Important note 2 - about Bulk Downloading:
    When using OSM Mapnik tile server as the tile source, take care about OSM Tile usage policy (http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tile_usage_policy). Do not let to end-users the ability to download significant areas of tiles.

      • currentCacheUsage

        public long currentCacheUsage()
        Returns:
        volume currently use in the osmdroid local filesystem cache, in bytes. Note that this method currently takes a while.

      • cacheCapacity

        public long cacheCapacity()
        Returns:
        the capacity of the osmdroid local filesystem cache, in bytes. This capacity is currently a hard-coded constant inside osmdroid.

      • directorySize

        public long directorySize(File pDirectory)
        Returns:
        the total size of a directory and of its whole content, recursively
